representationList.noSolutionsFound:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for when no solutions match the current filters.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Automation (solution list area)
**When Users See This**: When applying filters that result in no matching solutions.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "No solutions found."
representationList.tryChangingFilters:
**Functional Purpose**: Description prompting users to adjust filters to find solutions.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Automation (solution list area, below title)
**When Users See This**: When no solutions are found after applying filters.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Try changing your filters to find solutions that need feedback."
representationList.noSolutionsNeedFeedba:
**Functional Purpose**: Title indicating that there are currently no solutions requiring feedback.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Automation (solution list area)
**When Users See This**: When there are no solutions available for feedback.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "There are currently no solutions that need feedback."
representationList.checkBackLater:
**Functional Purpose**: Description encouraging users to check back later for new solutions.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Automation (solution list area, below title)
**When Users See This**: When there are no solutions available for feedback.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Check back here later for more!"
